name: One Chance Heist
description:
WADS or Arrow Keys to move.

 once six coins collected space bar for special move

collect ten coins to win

when ghosts are gliding they cannot hurt you

Story: Jeremy wants to rob a bank but he has no friends and is really bad at robbing banks. Jeremy has been caught by the elite force of cops known as ghosts for their ability to phase through walls. 

thanks to the YouTube channel scratch tutorials for collision code.
